kitsunemod:FoxShape.NAME: Fox Shape
kitsunemod:FoxShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Fox. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.NAME: Kitsune Shape
kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Weak. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Kitsune. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:HumanShape.NAME: Human Shape
kitsunemod:HumanShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !B! Block. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Human. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:Ingenuity.NAME: Ingenuity
kitsunemod:Ingenuity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block + !M! more for each time you've kitsunemod:Shapeshifted this combat.

kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.NAME: Test Their Tactics
kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw a card.

kitsunemod:SplitSoul.NAME: Split Soul
kitsunemod:SplitSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Draw a card. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Draw 5 cards.

kitsunemod:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
kitsunemod:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Set your kitsunemod:Light to !M!. Gain !B! Block.

kitsunemod:GrowingShadow.NAME: Growing Shadow
kitsunemod:GrowingShadow.DESCRIPTION: Set your kitsunemod:Dark to !kitsunemod:M2!. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

kitsunemod:FeralInstinct.NAME: Feral Instinct
kitsunemod:FeralInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Block 30 damage.

kitsunemod:InflictWounds.NAME: Inflict Wounds
kitsunemod:InflictWounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal.

kitsunemod:PerfectedShape.NAME: Perfected Shape
kitsunemod:PerfectedShape.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block for each turn you've remained in the same kitsunemod:Shape.

kitsunemod:Insight.NAME: Insight
kitsunemod:Insight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an kitsunemod:Aspect card, draw another kitsunemod:Aspect card from your draw pile.

kitsunemod:FastShape.NAME: Fast Shape
kitsunemod:FastShape.DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Shapeshift cards no longer Exhaust when played.
kitsunemod:FastShape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Shapeshift cards no longer Exhaust when played and cost !M! less.

kitsunemod:BladeAndClaw.NAME: Blade And Claw
kitsunemod:BladeAndClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Target loses !M! HP.

kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.NAME: Memorize Spell
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Retain it until next turn.
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand. Retain it until next turn.

kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.NAME: Ignite Silhouette
kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain kitsunemod:Dark equal to unblocked damage.

kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.NAME: Essence Theft
kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal and manually trigger it.

kitsunemod:RendSpirit.NAME: Rend Spirit
kitsunemod:RendSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Target loses !M! HP.

kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.NAME: Nourishing Flame
kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Channel !M! Will-o-wisp.
kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Channel !M! Will-o-wisps.

kitsunemod:BareFangs.NAME: Bare Fangs
kitsunemod:BareFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! Strength.

kitsunemod:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
kitsunemod:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! Dexterity.

kitsunemod:Cornered.NAME: Cornered
kitsunemod:Cornered.DESCRIPTION: Deal !kitsunemod:M2! + !M! % of your missing HP as damage. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Lose 15 HP.

kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.NAME: Ninetailed Form
kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You count as in all three kitsunemod:Shapes at once.

kitsunemod:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
kitsunemod:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: twice. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! kitsunemod:Shade. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: And !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:CleansingNova.NAME: Cleansing Nova
kitsunemod:CleansingNova.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose all Block to deal that much to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
